titleStmt.title: A discription of what God hath predestinated concerning man in his [brace] creation, transgression, & regeneration : as also an answere to Iohn Robinson, touching baptisme.
titleStmt.author: Murton, John.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Murton by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages cropped at top and faded with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
